metalign.hierarchy.lpcfg

Class MetricalLpcfgProbabilityTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.hierarchy.lpcfg.MetricalLpcfgProbabilityTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MetricalLpcfgProbabilityTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A MetricalLpcfgProbabilityTracker keeps track of counts for a MetricalLpcfg. Items can be added into these maps using the add... methods, and probabilities can be retrieved thorugh the get...Probability methods.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 3 May, 2016
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addMeasureHead

        public void addMeasureHead(Measure measure,
                           MetricalLpcfgHead head)
        Add a new measure head length mapping. This models p(headLength | measure). It updates the measureHeadMap.
        Parameters:
        measure - The measure.
        head - The head.

      • removeMeasureHead

        public void removeMeasureHead(Measure measure,
                              MetricalLpcfgHead head)
                       throws MetricalLpcfgElementNotFoundException

        Parameters:
        measure - The measure.
        head - The head.
        Throws:
        MetricalLpcfgElementNotFoundException - If the measure head to be removed is not found.

                          MetricalLpcfgNonterminal.MetricalLpcfgLevel level)
        Add a new transition mapping. This models p(transition | measure, type, headLength). It updates transitionMap.
        Parameters:
        measure - The measure.
        typeString - The type.
        head - The head.
        transitionString - The transition String.
        level - The level to use for back-off probabilities.

      • addHead

        public void addHead(Measure measure,
                    java.lang.String typeString,
                    MetricalLpcfgHead parentHead,
                    MetricalLpcfgHead head,
                    MetricalLpcfgNonterminal.MetricalLpcfgLevel level)
        Add a new head mapping. This models p(headLength | measure, type, parentHeadLength). It updates headMap.
        Parameters:
        measure - The measure.
        typeString - The type.
        parentHead - The parent's head.
        head - The head.
        level - The level to use for back-off probabilities.

        parentHead - The parent's head.
        head - The head.

      • getHeadProbabilityEstimate

                                         java.lang.String typeString,
                                         MetricalLpcfgHead head,
                                         MetricalLpcfgNonterminal.MetricalLpcfgLevel level)
        Estimates the probability p(headLength | measure, type, parentHeadLength). (Here we do not know parentHeadLength).
        Parameters:
        measure - The measure.
        typeString - The type.
        head - The head.
        level - The level to use in case we need to back off.
        Returns:

      • encode

        private static java.lang.String encode(Measure measure,
                                       java.lang.String typeString,
                                       MetricalLpcfgHead head)
        Encode the given measure, typeString, and head into a single String key. This is done so that we don't need huge nested Maps.
        Parameters:
        measure - The measure we want to encode.
        typeString - The typeString to encode.
        head - The head to encode.
        Returns:
        The encoded String.

      • encodeBackoff

        private static java.lang.String encodeBackoff(Measure measure,
                                              java.lang.String typeString,
                                              MetricalLpcfgHead head,
                                              MetricalLpcfgNonterminal.MetricalLpcfgLevel level)
        Encode the given measure's backup type (based on the level), typeString, and headLength into a single String key. This is done so we don't need huge nested Maps.
        Parameters:
        measure - The measure whose feature to encode.
        typeString - The typeString to encode.
        head - The head to encode.
        level - The level that decides which feature of the given measure to encode.
        Returns:
        The encoded String.

      • encode

        private static java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String measureKey,
                                       java.lang.String typeString,
                                       MetricalLpcfgHead head)
        Encode the given measureKey, typeString, and headLength into a String. This is done so we can use a single String key instead of large nested Maps.
        Parameters:
        measureKey - The measureKey to encode.
        typeString - The typeString to encode.
        head - The head to encode.
        Returns:
        The encoded String.
